TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlDependency extends System.Object

summary.span: 对象表示应用程序和 SQL Server 实例间的查询通知依赖关系。

span.span: The object represents a query notification dependency between an application and an instance of SQL Server.

summary.span: 应用程序可以创建一个 对象并进行注册以通过 事件处理程序接收通知。

span.span: An application can create a object and register to receive notifications via the event handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用于缓存方案，在此方案中，ASP.NET 应用程序或中间层服务需要将某些信息缓存在内存中。 is ideal for caching scenarios, where your ASP.NET application or middle-tier service needs to keep certain information cached in memory. 允许您在数据库中的原始数据发生更改时接收通知，以便刷新缓存。 allows you to receive notifications when the original data in the database changes so that the cache can be refreshed. 若要设置依赖关系，需要将 对象与一个或多个对象关联 。To set up a dependency, you need to associate a object to one or more objects. 若要接收通知，你需要订阅该 事件。To receive notifications, you need to subscribe to the event. 有关创建通知查询的要求的详细信息，请参阅使用[查询通知](/sql/relational-databases/native-client/features/working-with-query-notifications)。For more information about the requirements for creating queries for notifications, see [Working with Query Notifications](/sql/relational-databases/native-client/features/working-with-query-notifications). > [!NOTE] > 设计为在 ASP.NET 或中间层服务中使用，在该服务中，有相对较少数量的服务器依赖于数据库。 was designed to be used in ASP.NET or middle-tier services where there is a relatively small number of servers having dependencies active against the database. 它不是用于在客户端应用程序中使用的，其中成百上千的客户端计算机将 为单一数据库服务器设置对象。It was not designed for use in client applications, where hundreds or thousands of client computers would have objects set up for a single database server. 如果正在开发的应用程序在数据更改时需要可靠的第二秒通知，请查看规划[通知](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v%3dsql.105))一文中的 "[规划有效的查询通知策略](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#planning-an-efficient-query-notifications-strategy)" 和 "[查询通知的替代方案](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#alternatives-to-query-notifications)" 部分。If you are developing an application where you need reliable sub-second notifications when data changes, review the sections [Planning an Efficient Query Notifications Strategy](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#planning-an-efficient-query-notifications-strategy) and [Alternatives to Query Notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v=sql.105)#alternatives-to-query-notifications) in the [Planning for Notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2008-r2/ms187528(v%3dsql.105)) article. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 中的查询通知](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server)和[生成通知解决方案](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2005/ms171065(v%3dsql.90))。For more information, see [Query Notifications in SQL Server](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/query-notifications-in-sql-server) and [Building Notification Solutions](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/sql/sql-server-2005/ms171065(v%3dsql.90)). > [!NOTE] > 可能会在启动命令执行的线程的不同线程上生成事件。The event may be generated on a different thread from the thread that initiated command execution. 仅对满足一系列特定要求的 SELECT 语句支持查询通知。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements.

span.span: Using Query Notifications

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数 使用默认 Service Broker 服务名称和超时初始化对象。构造后的某个时间点，必须使用 方法将一个或多个命令关联到此 对象。The constructor initializes the object using the default Service Broker service name and time-out. At some point after construction, you must use the method to associate one or more commands to this object. 仅对满足一系列特定要求的 SELECT 语句支持查询通知。Query notifications are supported only for SELECT statements that meet a list of specific requirements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server Service Broker](/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/sql-server-service-broker)和使用[查询通知](/sql/connect/oledb/features/working-with-query-notifications)。For more information, see [SQL Server Service Broker](/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/sql-server-service-broker) and [Working with Query Notifications](/sql/connect/oledb/features/working-with-query-notifications).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与依赖项关联的结果集之一是否已经更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether one of the result sets associated with the dependency has changed.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示结果集之一是否已经更改。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether one of the result sets has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用的不是 事件，则可以通过检查 属性来确定查询结果是否已更改。If you are not using the event, you can check the property to determine if the query results have changed. 属性不一定意味着数据发生更改。The property does not necessarily imply a change in the data. 其他情况（如超时过期和设置通知请求失败）还会生成更改事件。Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate a change event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关联命令的结果更改时发生。 occurs when the results for the associated command change. 如果不使用 ，则可以通过检查 属性来确定查询结果是否已更改。If you are not using , you can check the property to determine whether the query results have changed. 此 事件不一定表示数据发生了更改。The event does not necessarily imply a change in the data. 其他情况（如超时已过期和设置通知请求失败）还会生成 。Other circumstances, such as time-out expired and failure to set the notification request, also generate .

summary.span: 启动用于接收依赖项更改通知的侦听器。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 SQL Server 连接中出现错误时，侦听器将重新启动。The listener will restart when an error occurs in the SQL Server connection. 对方法的多个调用 可以进行，但受到以下限制：Multiple calls to the method can be made, subject to the following restrictions: - 多个具有相同参数的调用（在调用线程中的连接字符串和 Windows 凭据相同）都是有效的。Multiple calls with identical parameters (the same connection string and Windows credentials in the calling thread) are valid. - 对于具有不同连接字符串的多个调用，只要：Multiple calls with different connection strings are valid as long as: - 每个连接字符串指定一个不同的数据库，或Each connection string specifies a different database, or - 每个连接字符串指定一个不同的用户，或者Each connection string specifies a different user, or - 调用来自不同的应用程序域。The calls come from different application domains. 对于使用多个线程的应用程序，如果没有将 dbo 角色提供给组，则可以对该应用程序进行正确的工作，因为不同的用户可以订阅和侦听（使用 或 ）到管理员创建的通知队列。You can make the work correctly for applications that use multiple threads to represent different user credentials without giving the dbo role to the group, because different users can subscribe and listen (using or ) to a notification queue created by an administrator. 当相关应用程序域启动时，请从有权初始化服务/队列的用户（"创建队列" 和 "创建服务" 权限）的（Windows）凭据开始调用。When the relevant application domain starts, call Start with the (Windows) credentials of a user that has permission to initialize a service/queue (the CREATE QUEUE and CREATE SERVICE permissions for the database). 确保每个 AppDomain 只调用一次 Start，否则会引发多义性异常。Ensure that Start is only called once per AppDomain, otherwise an ambiguity exception is raised. 用户线程必须有权订阅通知（数据库的订阅查询通知权限）。The user thread must have permission to subscribe to the notification (the SUBSCRIBE QUERY NOTIFICATIONS permission for the database). 将非管理员用户的订阅请求关联到管理员创建的服务/队列。 will associate the subscription request of a non-administrator user to the service/queue created by the administrator.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

span.span: if the listener initialized successfully; if a compatible listener already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启动的侦听器， 以便从参数指定的 SQL Server 实例接收依赖项通知 `connectionString` 。This method starts the listener for the for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter. 对于多个服务器，可以多次调用此方法和不同的连接字符串。This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers. 有关其他备注，请参阅 。For additional remarks, see .

span.span: The method was called from within the CLR.

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

summary.span: 启动用于接收依赖项更改通知的侦听器，该侦听器使用指定的 SQL Server Service Broker 队列从由连接字符串指定的 SQL Server 实例接收。

span.span: Starts the listener for receiving dependency change notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the connection string using the specified SQL Server Service Broker queue.

returns.span: 如果侦听器初始化成功，则为 ；如果已存在兼容的侦听器，则为 。

span.span: if the listener initialized successfully; if a compatible listener already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启动的侦听器， 以便从参数指定的 SQL Server 实例接收依赖项通知 `connectionString` 。This method starts the listener for the for receiving dependency notifications from the instance of SQL Server specified by the `connectionString` parameter. 对于多个服务器，可以多次调用此方法和不同的连接字符串。This method may be called more than once with different connection strings for multiple servers. 如果未指定任何队列名称，则 会在服务器中创建用于整个进程的临时队列和服务，即使该进程涉及多个进程也是如此 。If no queue name is specified, creates a temporary queue and service in the server that is used for the entire process, even if the process involves more than one . 应用程序关闭时，队列和服务将自动删除。The queue and service are automatically removed upon application shutdown. 有关其他备注，请参阅 。For additional remarks, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须为每个调用调用方法 。The method must be called for each call. 给定的侦听器在收到与请求相同数量的请求时，只会完全关闭 。A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of requests as requests.

summary.span: 停止在上一次 调用中指定的连接的侦听器。

span.span: Stops a listener for a connection specified in a previous call.

returns.span: 如果侦听器完全停止，则为 ；如果 从侦听器解除绑定，但至少还有另一个 使用同一侦听器，则为 。

span.span: if the listener was completely stopped; if the was unbound from the listener, but there is at least one other using the same listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须为每个调用调用方法 。The method must be called for each call. 给定的侦听器在收到与请求相同数量的请求时，只会完全关闭 。A given listener only shuts down fully when it receives the same number of requests as requests.

exception.span: 参数为 NULL。

span.span: The parameter is NULL.

exception.span: 此方法是从 SQLCLR 内部调用的。

span.span: The method was called from within SQLCLR.

exception.span: 调用方没有所必需的 代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required code access security (CAS) permission.

exception.span: 发生基础 SqlClient 异常。

span.span: And underlying **SqlClient** exception occurred.
Using Query Notifications
ADO.NET Overview
